reason_for_recall: Navy Beans with the can code MDSB S1GTD best by 7/18/14 are recalled  due to undeclared soy.  Truitt Bros,. Inc discovered that some canned chili beans were labeled as Navy Beans and soy was not declared on the Navy Beans label.
code_info: Can code: MDSB S1GTD best by 7/18/14.    Code interpretation:  MDSB is the internal code for this product.  S = Salem, 1 = Year (2011), G = month, T = Day, D = Shift (of manufacture).  Best by date is 7/18/14 (3 year shelf life)

On July 29, 2012  Publix Super Markets, Inc. issued a voluntary recall for custom made sub sandwiches that contain onions because they may be adulterated with Listeria monocytogenes.  Publix received notification from their supplier, who receives sliced onions from Gills Onions LLC.  This recall involves any custom made sub sandwich with onions sold from the Publix Deli department between July 7,
distribution_pattern: US in AL, GA, TN and SC. FL stores are not involved with this recall.

reason_for_recall: Incorrectly placed ingredient label for non-diet beverage on bottles of diet beverage.
